tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ECG_Data (
  patient_id INT,
  ecg_reading FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  abnormality_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE ECG_Data (
    patient_id INT,
    ecg_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    ecg_waveform BLOB,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, ecg_timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Info (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Abnormalities (
    patient_id INT,
    ecg_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    abnormality_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, ecg_timestamp, abnormality_type)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  ecg_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE ecg_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  ecg_reading JSON,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE abnormalities (
  abnormality_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  abnormality_type VARCHAR(50),
  severity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES ecg_records(record_id)
)

CREATE TABLE trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ecg_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  ecg_reading INT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE abnormality_detection (
  patient_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  abnormality_type VARCHAR,
  severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate (
  patient_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INT
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  patient_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  trend_type VARCHAR,
  trend_value FLOAT
)
